eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class ArrowMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.ArrowMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class ArrowMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. Menu that can be opened with a bow, that lets the player select their arrows to shoot.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    CustomWeaponBow

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Opens the menu for the given player. Shows all selectable arrow types, aswell as the count of arrows left.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        See Also:
        PlayerConfigurator.getSelectedArrows(Player), getArrowType(Player, String, String, Material), MenuUtils.setBorders(Inventory)

      • getArrowType

        private static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getArrowType(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                           java.lang.String selectedArrowType,
                                                           java.lang.String arrowType,
                                                           org.bukkit.Material material)
        Generates an item stack, to show infos about a selectable arrow type. Includes arrow tip color, effect description and amount of arrows left. If it is the currently selected arrow, it will be highlighted with an enchantment glow.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who owns the arrows.
        selectedArrowType - The selected type arrow.
        arrowType - The type of the arrow for this stack.
        material - The arrow material. (Normal, Spectral, Tipped...)
        Returns:
        The arrow type item stack.

      • getArrowDescription

        private static java.lang.String getArrowDescription(java.lang.String arrowType)
        Gets the colored description of the given arrow type.
        Parameters:
        arrowType - The type of the arrow.
        Returns:
        The colored description.

      • getArrowTipPotion

        private static org.bukkit.potion.PotionType getArrowTipPotion(java.lang.String arrowType)
        Gets the potion type to color the tip of the given arrow type in.
        Parameters:
        arrowType - The type of the arrow.
        Returns:
        The potion type for the arrow tip color.

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. The default event will be automatically canceled. If the clicked item is an arrow type, with more at least 1 arrow left, it will be selected. After that, the player will receive a message and the inventory will be closed.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        See Also:
        ItemUtils.getArrowCount(ItemStack), PlayerConfigurator.setSelectedArrowType(Player, String)
